SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Calendar
This class handles the calendar functionality of the application.
CalendarController
This class is the controller for the Calendar view in the user interface.
DayBlockController
This class is the controller for the DayBlock object in the user interface.
Formatter
This class sets formatting constraints for certain UI components.
IngredientListCell
ListCell class which manages the cells in the ingredient list, specifically in the inventory.
Inventory
Class for managing the sql queries for the inventory.
MainController
Main controller class handles the logic across all the views of the application.
MissingIngredientListCell
ListCell class which manages ingredients that are missing from the inventory based on the required ingredients in the recipe selected in the calendar.
MyApp
Use this class to start the application.
PopupManager
This class handles all popups in the application.
Recipe
This is a class for managing SQL-queries relating to the recipe view.
RecipeIngredientListCell
ListCell class which manages the cells in the ingredient list, specifically in the inventory.
Settings
This class manages the settings for the application.
ShoppingList
Class for managing SQL queries relating to the shopping list.
SqlConnector
This class handles all direct interactions with the SQLite database, and is responsible for querying and updating it according to the needs of the application.
ToolbarController
Controller class for the toolbar in the GUI.
UiCookbookController
Controller class for the cookbook view in the GUI.
UiHomeController
This class is the controller for the user interface, mediating between the model and view layers.
UiInventoryController
Controller class for the inventory view.
UiRecipeViewController
Controller class for the recipe view.
UiSettingsController
Controller class for the inventory view.
UiShoppingListController
Controller class for the shopping list view.
